definitions.definition: used for saying that something will have no effect

examples.text: No amount of encouragement would make him jump into the pool.

wordOrigin: Middle English (as a verb): from Old French amunter, from amont ‘upward’, literally ‘uphill’, from Latin ad montem. The noun use dates from the early 18th cent.
